text: Bong Joon-ho (, ; born September 14, 1969) is a South Korean movie director and screenwriter. He became internationally known for his second feature movie Memories of Murder (2003), The Host (2006) and Snowpiercer (2013). His 2019 movie, Parasite, earned him an Academy Award for Best Director in 2020. He was born in Daegu, South Korea. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Academy Award winning directors Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from Seoul Category:South Korean movie directors Category:South Korean screenwriters
title: Bong Joon-ho
